statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age < 25;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_name='Alice';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_date, product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 25 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_date, product_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_age, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'S%' AND purchase_amount < 50 ORDER BY customer_age ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING total_customers > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, product_category FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.product_price > 100;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT AVG(customer_age) AS avg_age FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers JOIN customer_purchases ON customers.customer_id = customer_purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, p.product_price FROM customers AS c JOIN customer_purchases AS cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN purchases AS pur ON cp.purchase_id = pur.purchase_id JOIN products AS p ON pur.purchase_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(cp.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers AS c JOIN customer_purchases AS cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT p.product_category, AVG(p.product_price) AS avg_price FROM products AS p GROUP BY p.product_category ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
